monsters.description: The magmaman resembles a humanoid non-descript creature, seemingly formed from molten rock. He has two thick arm-like appendages, ending in dripping claws.

monsters.description: The nomad has dark skin and the look of someone hardened by the harsh environment in which she lives. She is wearing dark linen clothing and is armed with a scimitar.

monsters.description: The bandit has the look of an accomplished rogue, and is dressed in an expensive silk tunic and pants of a rich red color. She is also wearing a chainmail jerkin and is armed with a wicked looking sabre.

monsters.name: Bandit
monsters.description: The bandit has the look of an accomplished rogue, and is dressed in an expensive silk tunic and pants of a deep blue color. He is also wearing a chainmail jerkin and is armed with a wicked looking sabre.

monsters.name: Smith
monsters.description: This dwarven smith is heavily muscled, his leather apron smeared with sweat and soot. He is very alert and has an expression of great calm and peace of mind. His eyes harden as he notices your intense stare, and he hefts the weight of his great hammer.

monsters.name: Giant Scorpion
monsters.description: The giant scorpion resembles a common scorpion, except that it is over eight feet in length.

monsters.name: Giant Slug
monsters.description: The giant slug is over seven feet long and drools acidic spittle from its maw.

special_attack.description: discharged a spray of acid at

monsters.name: Giant Bat
monsters.description: The giant bat has a wingspan of over twelve feet and has wicked looking claws and teeth.

monsters.name: Giant Spider
monsters.description: The giant spider's body is over six feet long, and it has thick hairy legs. A thick oily liquid drips from its mandibles.

monsters.name: Giant Asp
monsters.description: The giant asp is an enormous viper over twenty feet in length. Its scales are a dull tan and it's body is thicker than a large man's arm.

monsters.name: Stone Giantess
monsters.description: The stone giantess resembles a huge hairless woman with light greyish skin and stands nearly eighteen feet tall. She is armed with a huge club.

monsters.name: Stone Giant
monsters.description: The stone giant resembles a huge hairless man with dark greyish skin and stands nearly twenty feet tall. He is armed with a huge club.

monsters.name: Ice Giantess
monsters.description: The ice giantess resembles a huge woman with bone white skin, and long flowing white hair. She stands over nineteen feet tall, and is armed with a huge crystaline sword.

monsters.name: Ice Giant

special_attack.description: exhaled a blast of frost at

monsters.name: Flame Giantess
monsters.description: The flame giantess resembles a huge woman with ruddy skin and bright red hair. She stands over twenty five feet tall, is armed with a great axe made of a dull black metal, and wears dragonscale armor. She reguards you malignly with her smouldering red eyes, and smiles cruely.

special_attack.description: exhaled a blast of flame at

monsters.name: Flame Giant
monsters.description: The flame giant resembles a huge man with ruddy skin, bright red hair, and a coarse red beard. He stands nearly thirty feet tall, is armed with a great axe made of a dull black metal, and wears dragonscale armor. He regards you malevolently with his smouldering red eyes, and grins wickedly.

special_attack.description: exhaled a blast of flame at

monsters.name: Flame Giant Warlord
monsters.description: The flame giant resembles a huge man with ruddy skin, bright red hair, and a coarse red beard. He stands nearly thirty feet tall, is armed with a great spear made of a dark black metal that glows with a dull reddish light at the head. He wears armor of fine workmanship made from overlapping scales of a dark metallic blue. You sense great wisdom in his stern gaze.

special_attack.description: exhaled a blast of flame at

monsters.name: Forest Giantess
monsters.description: The forest giantess resembles a huge woman with brown skin and stands nearly fifteen feet tall. Her clothing is of woven vines and leaves. She is armed with a huge spear.

monsters.name: Forest Giant
monsters.description: The forest giant resembles a huge man with dark brown skin and stands nearly eighteen feet tall. His clothing is of woven vines and leaves. He is armed with a huge spear.

monsters.name: Lizard Warrior
monsters.description: The lizard warrior is a six foot tall bipedal humanoid who's features resemble those of a large lizard. He has greenish scaley skin, and sharp claws and teeth. He is armed with {0} {1}.
